name: Hambo Begins HD
description:
Download the @FreeAppADay.com Store App and wish for more top rated paid apps like "Hambo Begins HD" to become FREE for a day!

Hambo the war hero needs help rescuing his best friend Bacon from the enemy's evil clutches! Make use of your deadly arsenal and destroy those who dare to oppose Hambo on his noble rescue mission. Now's the time to eradicate injustice in this dangerous battlefield.

Vanquish your enemies and fight your way to Bacon in fun and reactive physics puzzles. Head to the store to change Hambo's look in more than 20 cool ways!

This game will entertain you with hours of explosive fun!

KEY FEATURES:

★ Over 20 cool costumes to leverage your gameplay experience
★ Amazing retina graphics
★ Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements
★ Game music, which automatically switches itself off at start when playing other music on your iPod/iPhone
★ Interactive tutorial to learn how to play

***************************************
Try also the free web version of Hambo on our website:
http://www.miniclip.com/games/hambo/
